short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays LLM prompts from a GitHub repository with search and filtering

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that provides easy access to LLM (Large Language Model) crowd-sourced prompts. Features include real-time search, tag filtering, and easy copying of prompts.

Features
- 🔍 **Real-time Search**: Instantly filter prompts as you type
- 🏷️ **Tag Filtering**: Filter prompts by clicking on tags
- 📋 **One-Click Copy**: Easily copy prompts to your clipboard
- 🎯 **Combined Filtering**: Use both search and tags simultaneously
- 📱 **Responsive Design**: Clean, user-friendly interface
- ⚡ **Fast Loading**: Efficient prompt loading and filtering
